title: Find Near Me -Places Around Me
summary: Find ATM, Bank, Gas, Café, Wi-Fi or virtually anything around you anywhere!
description: Find Near Me just got more personal. Now available for your Android Wear! Find Near Me is an easy to use app which helps you find ATM, Bank, Gas Station, Restaurant, Bar, Café, Hospital, Hotel, Taxi, Movie Theatre, Beauty Salon, Wi-Fi spots or virtually anything near you. How many times have you had a need to find a Gas Station in the middle of a trip or to locate the nearest ATM around you, in a city which you are new to? Find Near Me helps you to do this and much more in just a few taps.Find Near Me is highly customisable - it allows you to add and save your own search terms for future use.With this GPS locator app you can also search around any location across the globe and add them to their favorite search locations. So if you are planning a trip abroad and want to find restaurants, hotels, taxi services or just about anything you can do so easily with this app.Features:• Automatically finds your current location and plots it on a map.• Provision to include custom search terms.• Displays details such as address, phone numbers, distance from current location, etc. for the results from within the app.• Usable on-the-go to search for places of interest.• Provision to search in other locations and add them to your Search Locations.• Supports both portrait and landscape screen orientations.• Displays detailed information such as Ratings, Reviews, Opening Hours and Photos for places.• Customize the distance units (kms/miles), map types and the ordering of how search results are displayedSo, the next time you are searching for the nearest gas station, restaurants, cafes or hotels nearby; banks or ATMs around you, or that popular Theatre, you know what to do! Get Find Near Me, your personal trip advisor now and find anything and everything near and around you!If you are having technical issues or have any questions on this app you can email us on support@xlabz.comDisclaimer:Find Near Me uses Google Maps™ and Places API to find and plot locations and hence relies on the accuracy of the data provided by Google Maps™ The developer makes no assurance on the accuracy, relevancy or correctness of the data provided by the application.Google™ and Google Maps™ are registered trademarks of Google Inc.
descriptionHTML:
Find Near Me just got more personal. Now available for your Android Wear!

Find Near Me is an easy to use app which helps you find ATM, Bank, Gas Station, Restaurant, Bar, Café, Hospital, Hotel, Taxi, Movie Theatre, Beauty Salon, Wi-Fi spots or virtually anything near you.

How many times have you had a need to find a Gas Station in the middle of a trip or to locate the nearest ATM around you, in a city which you are new to? Find Near Me helps you to do this and much more in just a few taps.

Find Near Me is highly customisable - it allows you to add and save your own search terms for future use.

With this GPS locator app you can also search around any location across the globe and add them to their favorite search locations. So if you are planning a trip abroad and want to find restaurants, hotels, taxi services or just about anything you can do so easily with this app.

Features:
• Automatically finds your current location and plots it on a map.
• Provision to include custom search terms.
• Displays details such as address, phone numbers, distance from current location, etc. for the results from within the app.
• Usable on-the-go to search for places of interest.
• Provision to search in other locations and add them to your Search Locations.
• Supports both portrait and landscape screen orientations.
• Displays detailed information such as Ratings, Reviews, Opening Hours and Photos for places.
• Customize the distance units (kms/miles), map types and the ordering of how search results are displayed


So, the next time you are searching for the nearest gas station, restaurants, cafes or hotels nearby; banks or ATMs around you, or that popular Theatre, you know what to do! Get Find Near Me, your personal trip advisor now and find anything and everything near and around you!

If you are having technical issues or have any questions on this app you can email us on support@xlabz.com

Disclaimer:
Find Near Me uses Google Maps™ and Places API to find and plot locations and hence relies on the accuracy of the data provided by Google Maps™ The developer makes no assurance on the accuracy, relevancy or correctness of the data provided by the application.
Google™ and Google Maps™ are registered trademarks of Google Inc.
comments: Miss the dark theme! It helped my vision. Please make the dark theme an option. The ability to add your own search items and save them! [One drawback: I paid to have "ad-free" version and the ads were added to the list of reviewable locations.]

Will not work. Anytime I try to search for something on my android watch it just spins and never gives any results. I tried to uninstall and reinstall, but didn't fix. I would love to be able to use this app
